timing_rationales.morning_empty_stomach: Taking on an empty stomach ensures maximum absorption and effectiveness.
timing_rationales.with_meals: Taking with food reduces stomach irritation and improves tolerance.
timing_rationales.after_meals: Taking after food protects your stomach lining and prevents nausea.
timing_rationales.bedtime: Taking at bedtime helps maintain steady levels overnight and may reduce daytime side effects.
timing_rationales.before_meals: Taking before meals allows the medication to work when you need it most.
timing_rationales.consistent_time: Taking at the same time each day maintains steady medication levels in your body.
timing_rationales.spread_doses: Spacing doses evenly throughout the day maintains consistent therapeutic levels.
timing_rationales.as_needed: Take only when you experience symptoms, as directed.

frequency_explanations.OD: Take once daily at the same time each day
frequency_explanations.BD: Take twice daily, approximately 12 hours apart (e.g., 8 AM and 8 PM)
frequency_explanations.TDS: Take three times daily, approximately 8 hours apart (e.g., 8 AM, 4 PM, midnight)
frequency_explanations.QDS: Take four times daily, approximately 6 hours apart
frequency_explanations.PRN: Take only when needed for symptoms
frequency_explanations.weekly: Take once per week on the same day
frequency_explanations.1-0-1: Take 1 dose in the morning and 1 dose in the evening
frequency_explanations.1-1-1: Take 1 dose in the morning, afternoon, and evening

food_instructions.PC: Take immediately after meals or with food
food_instructions.with_meals: Take during or immediately after eating
food_instructions.empty_stomach: Take 1 hour before or 2 hours after food
food_instructions.with_water: Take with a full glass of water
food_instructions.avoid_dairy: Do not take with milk or dairy products; wait at least 2 hours

duration_explanations.short_course: Complete the full course even if you feel better to prevent resistance or recurrence.
duration_explanations.long_term: This is a long-term medication. Continue taking as prescribed and discuss any concerns with your doctor.
duration_explanations.chronic: This medication manages a chronic condition. Do not stop without consulting your doctor.
duration_explanations.as_needed: Use only when symptoms occur, following the maximum daily dose limits.
